tool_description: Optimizes shopping lists by organizing items by store sections, suggesting bulk purchases, and identifying opportunities for meal prep efficiency.

ingredients.description: Final list of ingredients to purchase

quantities.description: Quantities to purchase for each ingredient

bulk_threshold.description: Minimum quantity to suggest bulk purchase

priority_fresh.description: Whether to prioritize fresh ingredients at end of shopping

error_messages: Array length mismatch: ingredients, quantities, and units must have equal lengths.
Invalid bulk threshold: Must be a positive number greater than 0.
Empty shopping list: At least one ingredient required for optimization.
usage: Provide ingredients with quantities and units. Optionally specify store_layout, bulk_threshold, and priority_fresh preferences. Returns organized and optimized shopping list.

organized_sections.description: Shopping list organized by store sections

shopping_order.description: Optimal order to collect items in store

efficiency_tips.description: Tips for efficient shopping and meal prep
